class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">goes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#684044">love </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94ffb6">led </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">while </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94ffb6">stayed. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Beyond </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4840ff">Earth's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff4614">trafficking </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7074ff">frontier, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#705cff">moved, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#50ff4c">made. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
